sectiondef.header: Dynamic Payload Length Enable Configuration Register (DYNPD)

description.para: Contains the dynamic payload length enable bits for each pipe
View details in datasheet for more information
Contains the enable bits for the NRF24L01 special features
View details in datasheet for more information

detaileddescription.para: These definitions should be used when trying to control a specific property of the NRF24L01 which could be represented by one of more bits. For definitions designed for masking see NRF24L01 SPI Register Mask Definitions

The naming convention for all definitions is NRF24L01_r_REG_BIT_x where r is the register name where the bit is found and x is the name assigned to the register bit by the datasheet If register contains a bit field then REG_BIT is pluralized to REG_BITS
